CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The octyloxy chains on spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units can provide PSFDTBT with good solubility in common organic solvents.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| octyloxy chains |
| spirobifluorene |
| 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units |
| PSFDTBT |

The paragraph mentions several materials: "octyloxy chains", "spirobifluorene", "2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units", and "PSFDTBT". These are all chemical compounds or structures, and thus can be considered "materials".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |

After reviewing the paragraph again, I realize that only "PSFDTBT" is a clear material name. The other entities mentioned, such as "octyloxy chains" and "2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units", are more like descriptive components of other materials. Therefore, the only valid material name in the paragraph is "PSFDTBT".

The other entities, "octyloxy chains", "spirobifluorene", and "2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units" are not material properties, but rather components or features of the material.
